title: "To Kill a Mockingbird" Broadway play hit with lawsuit
text:
"To Kill a Mockingbird" Broadway play hit with lawsuit 11:16am GMT - 01:11 
The estate of ''To Kill a Mockingbird'' author Harper Lee is suing the producer of an upcoming broadway adaptation, claiming the play deviates too much from the novel. Ryan Brooks reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The estate of "To Kill a Mockingbird" author Harper Lee is suing the producer of an upcoming broadway adaptation, claiming the play deviates too much from the novel. Ryan Brooks reports.
